results.name: Number T(n,k) of tilings of a 2 X n X n box using k bricks of shape 2 X 1 X 1 and 2*(n^2-k) bricks of shape 1 X 1 X 1; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=n^2, read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..8, flattened
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, May 20 2017
